thread.title: A Worthwhile Find
thread.title_full: A Worthwhile Find - Review of Les Plumes Hotel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: H2972UZwilliamm
title: A Worthwhile Find
text:
Over all, we had a delightful stay at Les Plumes--even the wallpaper was a kick. You need to do something about the lack of closet space. Outside of that, we had no complaints. The hotel was charming, the staff smart and efficient, the location perfect , and the price right !
Room Tip: Try getting rid of the safe and refrigerator to use the space for a little closet space. See more room tips
